long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dictate effortlessly with Aqua Voice - the voice-native text editor powered by generative AI.

Aqua Voice for Chrome offers real-time voice dictation and natural language commands to help you write your best, no matter what you're working on in your browser. Just say things like "make this a list", "it's Erin with an E", or "add an inline citation here" and Aqua will take care of the rest.

With smart transcription, command interpretation, and contextual rewriting, Aqua is more than just dictation software. It's a tool that lets you write naturally with your voice, finding the best words to express yourself and communicate your ideas with ease. Aqua's powerful AI understands your intent, so you can focus on your message, not the mechanics of typing.

➤ How it works
Just talk to Aqua like you would a person. Aqua analyzes what you say and intelligently decides whether to transcribe your words verbatim, execute a formatting command, or subtly modify your dictation to match your writing intent. You can access Aqua from anywhere - it works seamlessly across the web.

➤ Go beyond basic dictation
Aqua combines different AI models to outperform traditional dictation in accuracy, formatting, and natural input. Aqua understands context to fix false starts and run-on sentences. It can handle complex formatting like "format this like an email" or "make the last bullet point shorter." The experience is collaborative - almost like the AI is your writing partner.

➤ Special Integrations
Gmail: Compose emails hands-free and let Aqua handle the formatting and editing
ChatGPT: Use Aqua to draft prompts directly in the ChatGPT interface

➤ Trusted by professionals everywhere
"[Aqua] has made me five times as productive as I was previously." — Historian
"[Aqua] helps me write everything from emails to brainstorming to papers to legal briefings."

➤ Pricing
Aqua is $10/month after a 1000-word free trial.

Install Aqua Voice for Chrome today and experience the magic of collaborating with AI to write naturally using your voice!

We'd love your feedback as we continue improving Aqua.

By installing the extension, you agree to Aqua's Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy:
https://withaqua.com/privacy
